## ArgumentParseError.CauseMap type


**Signature:**

```typescript
type CauseMap = SingleCauseMap & Record<keyof SingleCauseMap, {
        argKey: string;
        argValue: string;
    }> & {
        too_few_arguments: {
            argCount: number;
            minArgs: number;
        };
        too_many_arguments: {
            argCount: number;
            maxArgs: number;
        };
    };
```
